explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a blonde wig is standing outdoors next to a green trash can. He is wearing a red sweatshirt, blue sweatpants, and white shoes, with his right hand reaching into the trash can. Behind him is a grassy area with a few trees in the distance.
[0-2] The man then pulls out a slim beverage bottle from the trash can. The bottle contains an orange liquid. The man opens his mouth and looks at the camera.
